name: New Mandarin Seafood Restaurant – 時代文華海鮮酒
address: 4650 Gladstone St, Vancouver, BC V5N 5A2, Canada

hasMenuItem.name: 007. 时代文华虾饺  Steamed Prawn Dumplings
hasMenuItem.description: Delicate steamed prawn dumplings, featuring succulent prawn filling wrapped in translucent rice dough, garnished with a touch of fresh greens.

hasMenuItem.name: 011. 特味酱凤爪 Steamed Chicken Feet in Special Sauce
hasMenuItem.description: Tender chicken feet marinated in a savory special sauce, garnished with a slice of fresh green chili.

hasMenuItem.description: Crispy bean curd rolls filled with prawns and pork, garnished with fresh herbs and enoki mushrooms.

hasMenuItem.name: 019. 泰酱玉子豆腐  Deep Fried Shrimp Paste Stuffed Egg Tofu
hasMenuItem.description: Crispy deep-fried egg tofu stuffed with shrimp paste, drizzled with Thai sauce and garnished with fresh cilantro.

hasMenuItem.description: Delicate shumai filled with quail eggs and enhanced with black garlic, wrapped in spinach-infused dumpling skin.

hasMenuItem.description: Delicate dumplings filled with succulent scallops and shrimp, accented with a hint of wasabi for a mild kick.

hasMenuItem.name: 黑松露香茜捞走地鸡 shredded Ranch Chicken Mixed w/ Black Truffle & Cilantro.  (half)

review.reviewBody: I ordered 3 dim sum items. They were very tasty, the Siu Mai with 005. Quail Eggs Shumai / 菠菜汁黑蒜鵪鶉蛋燒賣 029. 韭黄鲜虾肠粉  Shrimp and Chive Rice Roll and Shrimp 007. 时代文华虾饺  Steamed Prawn Dumplings . The food is a bit on the pricey side though for the portion that you get.

Amazing as usual~~!!! 031. 黄沙猪润肠粉  Pork liver Rice Roll is a MUST order item!!! 020. Pan-Fried Dace Paste with Pepper / 家鄉煎釀尖椒 is my 2nd favorite!!! 005. Quail Eggs Shumai / 菠菜汁黑蒜鵪鶉蛋燒賣 is my 3rd~haha!!!
Best 031. 黄沙猪润肠粉  Pork liver Rice Roll in town!!! Everytime I ordered different items, all sooooo good & tasty!!! But pork liver rice roll is a MUST thing to order for me!!! Haha~~
Very good dim sum. The XO sauce daikon cake is really good. not sure if steam buns are worth it. will definitely try most dishes next time around.
Very taste restaurant, best dim sum in town
